patterns: Is it our choice to either choose new campus or old campus ?

patterns: Which field has better scope ?
responses: There is no such thing as “better scoper” because they all lead to different careers and have different specializations or subfields. Either discipline is a great choice for your studies, as long as you're passionate about technology, and you understand what each study option implies.

patterns: Is there any campus outside Lahore ?

patterns: What is the pucit acceptance rate?

patterns: What is the minimum criteria to apply to pucit?

patterns: Can a student with pre-medical background apply for bachelors in pucit?

patterns: How many marks are required in fsc for admission in bachelors in pucit ?
responses: 50% marks in either Pre-Engineering , ICS or medical and respective USAT test are required for admission in FCIT for bachelors.

patterns: Can a student with arts in fsc apply in pucit ?

patterns: Is there a library in pucit ?

patterns: Why did pucit changed to FCIT?

patterns: Which PUCIT campus is better for a BSCS, an old campus or a new campus?
responses: Both the old and new campuses of the Punjab University College of Information Technology (PUCIT) offer excellent facilities and resources for students pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSCS) degree. It ultimately depends on personal preferences and priorities. The old campus has a more traditional and established atmosphere, while the new campus offers state-of-the-art facilities and cutting-edge technology. Additionally, the new campus is located in a more convenient location, closer to public transportation and other amenities. Ultimately, it is recommended that you visit both campuses in person and speak with current students and faculty to make an informed decision.

patterns: What is the history of PUCIT?
responses: PUCIT was established in 2000 as a college of the University of the Punjab. It was founded with the goal of providing high-quality education and research in the fields of computer science and information technology. Over the years, PUCIT has grown into one of the leading institutions of its kind in Pakistan, with a strong reputation for its academic programs and its contributions to the field of computer science and information technology.

patterns: What is the faculty like at PUCIT?

The faculty is committed to providing students with a top-notch education and is actively involved in cutting-edge research in these fields. In addition, PUCIT provides opportunities for students to work with faculty members on research projects and other initiatives, helping to further their education and prepare them for careers in the field.

patterns: What is PUCIT dress code for male students?
responses: Shorts of any kind must not be part of the attire. Clothes should not be skin-tight. Loose-neck shirts are prohibited. Low-hung (hanging below waistline) pants are not allowed. Sunglasses or p-caps must not be worn in classrooms. Slippers are not allowed. Shirts with pictures or text printed on front or back are not allowed. However, shirts with small logos or emblems are acceptable.

patterns: What is PUCIT dress code for female students?
responses: Dupatta must be part of the attire. Shirts should not be over-fitted, or see-through. Shirt length should at least knee-length or longer. Length of sleeves must be three quarters or more. Necklines must be non-revealing. Fitted trousers, choori-dar pajamas, or tights must be accompanied by calf-length (half-way between knees and ankles) or longer length shirts without slits. Trousers must be ankle-length or longer.

patterns: What is Penalty for dress code violation?
responses: For a first offense, the student will be given verbal warning by the teacher. For a second offence, the students card will be taken and sent to SAC. SAC will issue as strict warning letter signed and approved by the Principal. The warning letter will be put in student file. For a third offense, the case will be forwarded to SAC and student will be suspended for one week from college rolls. The student will not be allowed to enter college premises in this period. For a fourth offense, the case will be forwarded to DC.

patterns: What are PUCIT email services?
responses: Using this service students and faculty members may communicate with one another. Students groups of different batches and programs are created for the ease of faculty and program coordinators for prompt message communication.

patterns: What are PUCIT Campus Management Services?
responses: Campus Management System or CMS is an in-house developed system by the FCIT. Using this system, students may obtain their semester wise progress report as well as their attendance rolls and can print out their fee vouchers etc. Similarly, this portal is also very useful for faculty and degree coordinators as well as program coordinators for marking students’ attendance and exam related seeding inputs.

patterns: When does FCIT offer admission to its BS, M.Phil. & PhD Programs?

patterns: Which  entrance test is required for admission in FCIT?

patterns: Does FCIT provide hostel facility?
responses: University of the Punjab hostel facility is available for students admitted to the morning/regular programs only.

patterns: Does FCIT give any transport facility to the students?
responses: Yes, University of the Punjab bus service is available for different routes in the city.

patterns: Difference between CS and SE?
responses: Computer Science (CS) focuses on the theoretical aspects of computing, algorithms, and data structures. Software Engineering (SE) focuses on the practical application of engineering principles to develop and maintain software systems. CS emphasizes theory, while SE focuses on software development practices and methodologies.

patterns: Difference between CS and DS?
responses: CS provides the theoretical foundations and tools necessary for computing, while DS is an application-driven field that leverages data analysis and statistical methods to extract valuable insights and solve real-world problems.

patterns: Difference between DS and SE?
responses: DS is centered around working with data and extracting insights, while SE is concerned with the engineering aspects of software development. DS professionals analyze data to generate insights, while SE professionals design and build software systems following engineering principles and practices.

patterns: Difference between DS and IT?
responses: DS is centered around data analysis and extracting insights, while IT is focused on managing and implementing technology infrastructure and applications. DS professionals work with data, while IT professionals handle the technology infrastructure and systems that support data processing and utilization.

patterns: Difference between IT and SE?
responses: Information Technology (IT) focuses on the management and implementation of technology infrastructure, systems, and applications. Software Engineering (SE) focuses on the design, development, and maintenance of software systems. IT focuses on technology management, while SE focuses on software development.

patterns: What is the admission criteria?
